scripts.deploy:brokLocal: pnpm prepare:brokLocal && pnpm build && pnpm create:local && pnpm deploy:local
scripts.deploy:brokDev: pnpm prepare:brokDev && graph deploy --product hosted-service broklab/captable_dev_11
scripts.deploy:brokStage: pnpm prepare:brokStage && graph deploy --product hosted-service  broklab/captable_stage_10
scripts.deploy:brokProd: pnpm prepare:brokProd && graph deploy --product hosted-service  broklab/captable_prod_10
